text:
More evidence that #Hydroxycloroquine and #chloroquine in #COVIDー19 are not associated with benefit in a large observational study of ~15,000 patients with hydroxy, chloro, hydroxy + azithro vs. ~81,000 controls. 

More Arrhythmias and excess risk attributable to drugs ~34%. https://t.co/8Oz286WejI
